data.comment: The big names in today's match at Philips Stadion have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Eindhoven.
In the minute 21, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Chukwunonso Madueke.
That's a fine assist from Philipp Max.
Caner Cavlan is booked for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Eindhoven.
The second-half is now underway.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's first substitution at Philips Stadion with Mauro Junior replacing Chukwunonso Madueke.
In the minute 61, The home team have replaced Mohammed Ihattaren with Bruma. This is the second substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
Lentini Caciano is replacing Robbert de Vos for Emmen at Philips Stadion.
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a second substitution, with Anco Jansen replacing Marko Kolar.
In the minute 81, Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a third substitution, with Nick Bakker replacing Caner Cavlan.
Denis Granecny is replacing Miguel Araujo for Emmen at Philips Stadion.
Yvon Mvogo has the misfortune to make it 1-1 through an own goal.
In the minute 85, At Philips Stadion, Nikolai Laursen has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Anco Jansen (Emmen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dick Lukkien is making the team's fifth substitution at Philips Stadion with Desevio Payne replacing Sergio Pena.
That's full-time at Philips Stadion. The final score is 2-1.
The home team have replaced Cody Gakpo with Maxime Delanghe. This is the third substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
Maximiliano Romero heads in to make it 2-1 at Philips Stadion.
